com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface ImplicitFlavorsInferringDescription

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppleBinaryDescription, AppleLibraryDescription, CxxBinaryDescription, CxxLibraryDescription

    public interface ImplicitFlavorsInferringDescription
    While building up the target graph, we allow descriptions to apply default flavors (e.g., #iphonesimulator-x86_64 for C++ or Objective-C libraries built in an iPhone simulator environment) from the .buckconfig file.
